Job Title: Education & Training Manager-CHHA

Location: Bronx, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Health Care Provider, Other

Description:
Opportunity Description
Do you have a passion for caring for older adults? Are you excited about working with other nursing professionals to improve patient outcomes, decrease re-hospitalization rates, and improve patient functional levels? If so, you have found the right place to pursue your passion! We invite you to join our compassionate and dedicated team making a difference in the lives of our members at the Certified Home Health Agency. 
Ideal candidates will be eligible for a $15,000 (less taxes) sign-on bonus.The position is on-site in the Bronx, NYFree assigned parking available  Company Information
The Home Health Agency provides the acutely ill patient with short term skilled home visits: nursing, physical therapy, occupational therapy, speech therapy, and social work. 
Job Duties
The CHHA Manager of Staff Education and Training will educate, orient, train, and evaluate clinical and non-clinical staff to maintain and assure quality care services to patients. The individual works in partnership with clinical leadership to ensure clinical and regulatory compliance benchmarks are met by all clinical and non-clinical staff. The individual provides guidance on clinical documentation competence for the homecare staff and facilitates smooth coordination of care, integration of services, clinical decision-making, and reporting for admitted patients. They will be responsible for assessing the needs of all disciplines and providing educational support for specific home care requirements such as OASIS, regulatory compliance, and patient/disease-specific care planning. Education
Current New York State license to practice as a Registered Nurse.Must have a Bachelor of Science in Nursing. Master’s Degree in Public Health or Nursing Education preferred
Experience & Skills Required
Current New York State license to practice as a Registered Nurse. Must have a Bachelor of Science in Nursing. Master’s Degree in Public Health or Nursing Education preferred. Two years of experience in a Certified Home Health Care Agency. Minimum 3 years of recent professional nursing experience in clinical, administrative, or teaching capacity preferred. Must be able to effectively disseminate information to all levels of staff through verbal and written communication. Proficient and competent with Microsoft Office. Current Basic Life Support (BLS) for Healthcare Providers. Knowledge of OASIS/OASIS Certification preferred. Knowledge of HCHB or EPIC EMR Platforms is preferred. 
Certifications
Current New York State license to practice as a Registered Nurse. Must have a Bachelor of Science in Nursing. Master’s Degree in Public Health or Nursing Education preferred. Two years of experience in a Certified Home Health Care Agency. Minimum 3-years recent professional nursing experience in clinical, administrative or teaching capacity preferred. Must be able to effectively disseminate information to all levels of staff through verbal and written communication. Proficient and competent with Microsoft office. Current Basic Life Support (BLS) for Healthcare Providers. Knowledge of OASIS/OASIS Certification preferred. Knowledge of HCHB or EPIC EMR Platforms preferred.
